title: mrokkEdarA nI pAda
sahitya:
mrokkEdarA nI pAdamulanu cakkani shrI AnjanEya


anupallavi

  makkuvatOnu brOva samayamu cukkalu molagajjelaina nIku


caraNam 1    rAmanAma pArAyaNa sItA rakSa vishAlavakSa surapakSa
bhIma parAkrama shOka vinAshana kAmita phalada kAncanacEla
    caraNam 2    kapikula shEkhara gAnavinOda karuNAkara dInamandAra
kapaTa dAnava bhayankara dashakaNTha garvApahAra dhIra
    caraNam 3    sadAshiva pAlana mAnasa sadamala kIrti mangaLamUrtE
mrdupada yugaLa vAridhi langhana mEdinI tanayAnyUna harSada
